properties.areaDesc: McDonald, MO; Newton, MO; Lawrence, MO; Barry, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 7:54AM CST until January 18 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
At 753 AM CST, reporting gauges indicated flooding across the warned
area. Up to one and a half inches of rain has already fallen. While
no additional rainfall is expected, residual flooding will continue
through much of today.

Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the warning include...
Southern Joplin...                Neosho...
Roaring River State Park...       Big Sugar Creek State Park...
Monett...                         Aurora...
Mount Vernon...                   Cassville...
Seneca...                         Marionville...
Granby...                         Anderson...
Noel...                           Duquesne...
Dodge...                          Shell Knob...
Pierce City...                    Goodman...
Purdy...                          South West City...

This warning includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Highway C at Indian Creek north of Anderson...
Highway C at Flatt Creek north of Cassville...
Highway 97 at The Spring River north of Stotts City...
Route Y at Flat Creek just northeast of Cassville...
and Route C just south of Mcdowell.
properties.instruction:
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are
potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded
roads. Find an alternate route.

NWSheadline: A FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CST FOR NEWTON... MCDONALD...BARRY AND LAWRENCE COUNTIES
